name: @vincss-public-projects/fido2-client
description: FIDO2 Client for Node.js, support PIN protocol

scripts.rebuild: node-gyp rebuild && cd node_modules/@pokusew/pcsclite && node-gyp rebuild
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build:native && cross-env DEBUG=TRUE node dist/test.js
scripts.test:rxjs: npm run build && cross-env DEBUG=TRUE node dist/test-rxjs.js
scripts.test:ble: npm run build && cross-env DEBUG=TRUE node dist/test-ble.js
scripts.test:electron: npm run rebuild:pcsclite && npm run build:native && npm run build && cross-env DEBUG=TRUE electron --trace-warnings dist/test-electron.js
scripts.test:electron:console: npm run rebuild:pcsclite && npm run build && cross-env DEBUG=TRUE electron dist/test-electron-console.js
scripts.test:usb: npm run build && cross-env DEBUG=TRUE node dist/test-usb.js
scripts.test:native: npm run build:native && npm run build && cross-env DEBUG=TRUE node dist/test-native.js

author: VinCSS R&D
